original_text: But the Lord will do a great thing, like he did at Mount Perazim. He will be very angry, as he was in the Gibeon Valley. He will do something that is very wonderful and strange. But the Lord will do a great thing, like he did at Mount Perazim. He will be very angry, as he was in the Gibeon Valley. He will do something that is very wonderful and strange.
korean_text: 대저 여호와께서 브라심 산에서와 같이 일어나시며 기브온 골짜기에서와 같이 진노하사 자기의 일을 행하시리니 그의 일이 비상할 것이며 자기의 사역을 이루시리니 그의 사역이 기이할 것임이라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord will do a great thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주님께서 큰 일을 행하실 것인데

sentences.original_text: like he did at Mount Perazim
as he was in the Gibeon Valley
He will do something that is very wonderful
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서는 매우 놀라운 일을 행하실 것이며
